entry.title: $2650 // BRIGHT OPEN ONE BEDROOM ON A WELL MAINTAINED BUILDING NO FEE LAUNDRY
entry.content:
BRIGHT OPEN ONE BEDROOM ON A WELL MAINTAINED BUILDING NO FEE LAUNDRY SUPER

Listing ID #: 1444197
Price: $2,650
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0 (TRUE 1 BEDROOM)
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: No Pets

This building is located in the Upper east side well-maintained building CROSS 1ST AVENUE..Near transportation, with the 6 and Q trains, grocery stores, restaurants/bars, shops, Citi Bike.All conveniently right around the corner. . Conveniently located only steps away from fine dining, restaurants, shopping, and all forms of transportation..This building also have intercom and there is a super living there too.Very friendly neighborhood to live in quiet and calm after a long day at work, if you work at home very bright apartment to keep you up to do your best work.Come see it Come see it you won't regret it.

Apartment Features: – Massive ONE BEDROOM with great natural light – Easily fit a Queen size bed, dresser, – Spacious living area for couch, TV center, and more – Marble bathroom – Great closet space – Hardwood floors

Enide Douillard Laguerre My phone is number 347-243-6027 CALL OR TEXT, I will be glad to help you along your search within your budget. I have access to everything on the market and my goal is to always offer excellent customer service. If you want an honest agent who will really listen to your needs, give me a call.
